Package seng202.group2.model

Class ActiveData

java.lang.Object
seng202.group2.model.DataSource
seng202.group2.model.ActiveData
public class ActiveData
extends DataSource
Active data class manages the filters, frame size and selected data, allowing the views to display a subset of the database

    • getActiveRecords

      public java.util.ArrayList<CrimeRecord> getActiveRecords​(int start, int limit)
      Get currently active records from a range of indices. From (min) to (min+limit).
      Parameters:
      start - -- The Smallest row index to get from database (EXCLUSIVE)
      limit - -- The range of values to get (INCLUSIVE)
      Returns:
      ArrayList of active records between start and end.

    • toggleSelectRecord

      public void toggleSelectRecord​(java.lang.Integer id)
      Selects a record if it is not selected, otherwise deselects a record if it is selected.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the CrimeRecord to (de)select.

      public boolean isSelected​(java.lang.Integer id)
      Checks if a crime record is selected.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the CrimeRecord the selection of which is to be determined.
      Returns:
      True if the CrimeRecord is selected, false if not.
